Title: The New World (1)
Plot: Ryland and other government officials are on trial for withholding vital information that they discovered about the returnees when a disturbing sound is heard the courtroom. Tom and Diana, with the help of Gary Navarro, try and track down T.J Kim, who they believe is responsible for the piercing sound heard in the courtroom. Richard and Lily are forced to deal with a now grown Isabelle While Lily also suffers from a rapid aging disease that Shawn is unable to heal. Tom and Diana also investigate
GuestStars: Peter Bryant,  Matthew Gray,  Jocelyn  Loewen,  Andrew Kavadas,  Ian Tracey,  Leanne  Adachi,  Fred Henderson,  Sharif Atkins,  Tippi Hedren
